row._OPS_INFO:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <!DOCTYPE Abend_History [ <!ELEMENT Abend_History EMPTY>
<!ELEMENT Content (General_Info, Restart_Info, Abend_History)>
<!ELEMENT General_Info EMPTY>
<!ELEMENT Restart_Info EMPTY> ]> <Content> <General_Info/> <Restart_Info/> <Abend_History/> </Content>

row.process: ! ! This goes and gets the object name and run number of the object that has ! exceeded its max runtime. Then it sends a message to OVO (using the :PRINT ! statement) so Operations can investigate the reason. ! ! NOTE: generate at runtime MUST be checked for this to work. ! :SET &OBJNAME# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NAME(ACT) :SET &RUNNO# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR(ACT) :PRINT 'UC4ALERT: Task &OBJNAME# Run # &RUNNO# has been executing for longer than expected. Please investigate.'
